item.description:
For members attending the show, after you enter the room look for the tables in the front. Around a dozen people (or more) will probably be sitting close to the center of the stage. Last time I was there with a group, I ended up about ten feet from the comedians!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I am planning to attend the Comedy Zone at the Showcase (Rte. 2 and Division St.)
Saturday night with some friends. The doors open at 6:30 pm for those who want to order dinner before the show. Three comics are performing this weekend - an Irish Comedy Tour. You can read more about them at http://www.nationalam...

Entrance to the comedy show is at the rear of the Showcase. Park in the back lot - towards the 1149 Restaurant. Admission is $10.

Who would like to join us?

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Comedy night at the Showcase Cinema
